english.segment1: You're the Lord of the dance. You're the dancing Lord
english.segment2: Everybody dance now. In the Holy Spirit. Everybody love the One, love the One. Love the One, the One you love the most now. Can't nobody stop me now. Gonna give it all I got. Gonna run to You, run to You. Run to You, just like a child
english.segment3: It's just this love I have inside. (yeah, I want it). I need Your presence in my heart. (yeah, I need it). I want You love more each day. ( more and more, Lord). and when I dance before You, Lord. I'm gonna dance with all my might
